alert.note: Alert for Northern Trinity; Southern Trinity (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 12 at 3:17PM PDT by NWS Eureka
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Trinity County through 345 PM PDT... At 316 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Hayfork and highway 3, moving south at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hayfork and Junction City. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
